name: MARCO Promotional Products
tag_list: promotional-items, promotional-products, custom-promotional-items, custom-promotional-products, promotional-marketing-products, imprinted-promotional-items, customized-promotional-products, customized-promotional-items, imprinted-promotional-products, cor
description: Marco was founded by Martin Arch in 1964
overview:
“MARCO was founded by Martin Arch in 1964 as a family business serving the local central Pennsylvania area. Martin’s son, Ken, joined the business in 1988 and acquired the business from his father in 1994. Under Ken’s direction, MARCO grew to be one of the industry’s leading providers of promotional items and meeting supplies to thousands of businesses across the United States and Canada. On June 8, 2005, Dick Nelson, former CEO and founder of 4imprint (formally, Nelson Marketing) acquired a majority of MARCO from Ken.

Today, MARCO serves tens of thousands of customers with a team of experienced, knowledgeable promotional products experts who are ready to help marketers find the right custom imprinted items while staying within their budget. MARCO’s first priority is to ensure 100% satifaction by providing straight-up, honest pricing supported by a triple-back lowest price guarantee and on-time delivery.
